Episodes.Title: The Best of Enemies
Episodes.Writer: Sheldon Bull, Dennis Koenig, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: En route to R&R, Hawkeye is flagged down by a North Korean soldier who holds him at gun point, forcing him to treat his wounded comrade. Back in camp, the officers change partners in a bridge tournament.

Episodes.Title: Letters
Episodes.Writer: Dennis Koenig, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: The staff of the 4077th answer letters from school children from Hawkeye's home town of Crabapple Cove.

Episodes.Title: Cementing Relationships
Episodes.Writer: David Pollock, Elias Davis, Dennis Koenig
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: To fight an ongoing infection in the O.R., the staff decides to remove the old wood floor and make a concrete one. The surgeons do the menial labor while Klinger acts as foreman (he knows cement and it's not that hard); while an I...

Episodes.Title: Father's Day
Episodes.Writer: Karen Hall, Dennis Koenig, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Margaret's cold-hearted father visits while the gang tries to hide a stolen side of beef that was given to them by an appreciative patient.

Episodes.Title: Death Takes a Holiday
Episodes.Writer: Mike Farrell, John Rappaport, Dennis Koenig
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: While local orphans attend a Christmas party in the mess tent, Hawkeye, B.J., and Margaret try to save the life of a critically injured solider so that his family won't think of Christmas as the day that their father died.

Episodes.Title: A War for All Seasons
Episodes.Writer: Dan Wilcox, Thad Mumford, Dennis Koenig
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: The year 1951 as seen in retrospect, from Margaret's knitting that never stops growing, to the baseball season that ends in the famous Dodgers-Giants pennant race (and Winchester's gloom). They all hope 1952 will somehow be better.

Episodes.Title: Your Retention Please
Episodes.Writer: Erik Tarloff, Dennis Koenig, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: When a pushy retention officer comes to the camp to persuade staff to extend their terms of service, Klinger, distraught at his domestic situation, is persuaded to do so.

Episodes.Title: Tell It to the Marines
Episodes.Writer: Hank Bradford, Dennis Koenig, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: B.J. and Hawkeye try to get a hardship discharge for an immigrant Marine whose Mom is being deported before he can get home. Winchester becomes C.O. for a few days, using his new position to get himself silk sheets and other "basi...

Episodes.Title: Taking the Fifth
Episodes.Writer: Elias Davis, David Pollock, Dennis Koenig
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Klinger happens upon a bottle of vintage French wine and Hawkeye uses it to lure a nurse into his clutches. Winchester deals with Klinger to get more bottles of the wine. Col. Potter trades with the Canadians for a special anesthe...

Episodes.Title: Operation Friendship
Episodes.Writer: Dennis Koenig, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: When the autoclave (instrument sterilizer) explodes in O.R., Klinger pushes Charles out of the line of fire just in time, but B.J. catches part of the blast and has a serious arm injury. For saving his life, Charles declares he is...

Episodes.Title: No Sweat
Episodes.Writer: John Rappaport, Dennis Koenig, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: The 4077th deals with a sudden heat wave in their own personal ways: Klinger disassembles the P.A. system, Charles goes through all of his tax returns and bonds, B.J. stresses over a letter from Peg, Margaret develops a severe cas...

Episodes.Title: Depressing News
Episodes.Writer: Dan Wilcox, Thad Mumford, Dennis Koenig
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: When a supply snafu brings too many tongue depressors to camp, Hawkeye uses the extras to erect a monument to the wounded who have passed through camp. Klinger starts his own camp newspaper.

Episodes.Title: No Laughing Matter
Episodes.Writer: Elias Davis, David Pollock, Dennis Koenig
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Hawkeye's challenge to go through a day without telling a joke is complicated by Winchester's amusingly desperate attempt to curry the favor of a hated visiting officer.

Episodes.Title: Oh, How We Danced
Episodes.Writer: John Rappaport, Dennis Koenig, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: When Winchester goes to inspect the sanitary conditions at another camp, the failing mark he gives the commander is met with physical violence. Meanwhile, the gang comes up with a surprise for B.J. on his anniversary.

Episodes.Title: Bottoms Up
Episodes.Writer: Dennis Koenig, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Margaret's good friend Captain Helen Whitfield visits the 4077th and it seems like old times again, but what the Major doesn't know is that Whitfield is still a raging closet-alcoholic; Meanwhile, Hawkeye pulls one prank that goes...

Episodes.Title: The Red/White Blues
Episodes.Writer: Elias Davis, David Pollock, Dennis Koenig
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Col. Potter's blood pressure is too high and he has two weeks to get it back down, causing everyone to mollycoddle him, much to his dismay. Meanwhile, the malaria medicine they are sent makes Klinger sick.

Episodes.Title: Bless You Hawkeye
Episodes.Writer: Dan Wilcox, Thad Mumford, Dennis Koenig
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Hawkeye starts inexplicably sneezing uncontrollably until Col. Potter suspects it's psychological in nature and calls in Dr. Freedman.

Episodes.Title: Blood Brothers
Episodes.Writer: David Pollock, Elias Davis, Dennis Koenig
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: While Father Mulcahy frantically tries to prepare for a visit from a respected cardinal, Hawkeye has to deal with a soldier who cannot donate blood for his buddy because it turns out that he himself has leukemia.

Episodes.Title: The Foresight Saga
Episodes.Writer: Dennis Koenig, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Klinger accidentally breaks Potter's eyeglasses, requiring a visit from traveling optometrist Dr. Bud Herzog. The 4077th receives fresh vegetables from a grateful Korean. Potter questions the authenticity of an upbeat letter from ...

Episodes.Title: The Life You Save
Episodes.Writer: John Rappaport, Alan Alda, Dennis Koenig
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Mike Farrell, Harry Morgan
Episodes.Plot: Winchester goes on a spiritual journey after a near-death experience. Hawkeye experiences the problems of being the officer in charge of food services when Potter rotates the duty roster.
